title: Russia Launches Largest Air Assault on Ukraine, Fires 537 Weapons
snippets: Russia launched the largest aerial assault on Ukraine overnight since the beginning of the full-scale invasion, according to the Ukrainian Air Force.

The attack has further diminished hopes for a resolution to the ongoing war, now in its third year.
